text: Hong Kong competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland. Four athletes competed four Hong Kong, and a non-participant served as flag-bearer for the Hong Kong delegation at the opening ceremony. ==Athletes== * Francisco Xavier Monteiro (1926 Hong Kong-?) ** Men's 100 m Freestyle ** Men's 400 m Freestyle ** 1500 m Freestyle * Kin Man Cheung (1932 Borneo -?) ** Men's 100 m Freestyle ** Men's 400 m Freestyle ** 1500 m Freestyle * Cynthia Eager (1936 Hong Kong-?) * Women's 100 m Freestyle * Women's 400 m Freestyle * Irene Anita Kwok Kam Ngor (1933 Hong Kong-?) * Women's 200 m Breaststroke ==References== *Official Olympic Reports *Hong Kong Category:Nations at the 1952 Summer Olympics 1952 Summer Olympics Category:1952 in Hong Kong sport
title: Hong Kong at the 1952 Summer Olympics
